name: Figs and Blueberries In Citrus Broth
keywords: blueberries, citrus, figs, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, dessert, summer
recipeIngredient: 16 ripe black figs, pricked a few times with a fork
1 banana, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the juices in a nonreactive saucepan. Add the ginger, honey and rum and bring to a boil. Gently place the figs, blueberries and banana in the liquid. Cover, remove from heat and set aside to cool. Refrigerate until cold. Take the figs out of the liquid, cut them in half lengthwise and return them to the liquid. Divide among 4 shallow rimmed soup plates, garnish with the mint leaves and serve.
